title: Campus Garden
description: A lush and serene garden area, perfect for relaxation and group discussions.

title: Auditorium
description: State-of-the-art auditorium for seminars, cultural programs, and large events.

title: Advanced Research Lab
description: A hub for cutting-edge research and experimentation across various fields.

description: An outdoor venue for performances, gatherings, and leisure activities.

title: Science Lab
description: Equipped with the latest tools for hands-on learning in the sciences.

description: The central building housing administrative offices and classrooms.

title: Student Activity Center
description: A vibrant space for student clubs, cultural activities, and community events.
